website_summaries.verdict: Citrus Magic is a surprisingly powerful air freshener that quickly eradicates the most powerful of smells, while replacing them with crisp orange, berry, and lemon scents.
pros: Lasts up to 4 times longer than average air freshener sprays
cons: It may seem like you aren’t getting much when you first see the trio of 3-ounce bottles, but a little goes a long way

customer_reviews.title: It really is magic!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stuff! It makes my whole house smell good and the citrus seems to put me in a happy mood! As an added bonus, we discovered that while camping, Citrus Magic is a good way to take care of bugs. Our camper was invaded one night and we had hundreds of small flies all over the ceiling and wall. Rather than squish them and have big guts and parts everywhere, we sprayed Citrus Magic on them. They “droppped like flies” and we just swept them up! The camper smelled fresh and we were bug free the rest of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Like the product, hate the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I had used this product for years. Like the product, but not all over my hands and the floor. The spray nozzle on all three of the package were defective and the liquid flowed over hands. Very disappointed in this item. No choice but to toss all bottles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective spray Button
customer_reviews.text: Beware some cans may be defective. I ended up with liquid spilling over my hand an it ran down my arm causing a skin rash. I washed it off thourougly and still caused a terrible rash. Really good stuff though.....smells great. Unfortunately all three can were defective and Im out money. They sent the wrong onrs also.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne  Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Scent from Citrus to Bug Spray
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this spay years ago but it was expensive. So I recently ordered this product and now the first 2 seconds after you spray there is a citrus scent, but then the scent turns and smells like a bug killer that lingers awhile. I'm sad and wont but this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Smells like orange dream creamsicle!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like an orange creamsicle but don't eat it!!! Covers up unpleasant smells very well. I've tried the regular orange and love that so I thought I'd give this a whirl and YES I love it Would def buy again. For the price the bottles are fine it comes with three together. Spray up high like the bottle says and not too much it can actually make the floor slick if you have tile because of the natural orange oils and you may fall so just be careful and to not use it like regular ole bathroom spray a little goes a long way fairly potent lingers for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: UmbrellaCo.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Smelling and Great at Covering Gross Odors!
customer_reviews.text: These are bathroom and kitchen savers! The smell is fragrant without being overpowering, and it's crisp and clean smelling. Truly smells just like an orchard in Florida. I wish that this wasn't oil-based, because if you have wood floors you will notice a sheen of (slippery) oil wherever the droplets of the spray land, but overall that's not enough to deter me from continuing to use this! Completely covers most grosser odors, whether they are bathroom or kitchen related! I've been using this product for at least 15 years, and I don't imagine stopping anytime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lott

customer_reviews.title: bottles leak instead of spray
customer_reviews.text: The odor elimination is good. However 2 out of the 3 bottles in package leak more than spray. 75% of the product is lost to the spray top leaking and dripping the oil all over the floor, the bottle and my hand instead of being sprayed into the air. I will NEVER purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: ... what happened but all 3 in a 3-pack smelled bad. NOT orange like we have used for many ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened but all 3 in a 3-pack smelled bad. NOT orange like we have used for many years but some strange mix of orange, maybe almond, grapefruit and ?? Unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Quintessence

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Alternative
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling, long lasting spray made from real lemons, so you know what is going into your air. Highly effective in defeating bathroom odors. Lasts for months in a bathroom used by one person, longer than brands like Glade. One short spray is usually enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Misleading big bottle only has 3 oz
customer_reviews.text: The smell is my favorite . But my problem with this brand is that they could add a whole lot more than 3 oz in the size bottle it puts it in. Posting a pic of another brand, same size bottle holds more than double of the product
customer_reviews.author: GCO

customer_reviews.title: Citrus fragrance barely present
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased as I could order in sets of 3s rather than 6 as when I ordered pure citrus; however, it cannot compare favorably in any way to the pure citrus--the smell is so faint as to hardly be recognized. The pure citrus has a very nice orange fragrance and is superior in eliminating bad odors, so I will stick to this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: James M Sprott

customer_reviews.title: OH YUCK.  SMELLS REALLY YERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: Yuck. Yuck. Yuck.....sprayed this in my downstairs bath and now my whole house smells disgusting. Not at all Ike a fresh orange smell - which I adore. Smells like stinky rotten fruit. Chemically. Ugly horrible......so disappointed. Sadly returns not allowed so I’m going to just bin it, as they say in England. Do not buy this c.r.a.p.
customer_reviews.author: Dede Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Natural herbal scent
customer_reviews.text: I use only natural air fresheners, as others tend to aggravate my allergies. Citrus Magic lavender and eucalyptus is probably my 3rd favorite scent, after orange and grapefruit. It all comes down to personal preference. I agree with other reviewers that the mixture is a bit more eucalyptus than lavender, but I still like it. Has a pleasing, natural scent that covers others unpleasant odors very well.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Better than poo pourri
customer_reviews.text: Worth buying multiples. We first found this at a hotel in Oregon and fell in love with it. If you have any kind of gastric distress which causes embarrassing trips to the bathroom this is for you. The citrus scent is strong but fades after it has done the job.
customer_reviews.author: Front porch observer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced - go to walmart
customer_reviews.text: Paid $17 for the 3 pack. I was surprised at how small the cans were. I was even more disappointed when I saw the larger cans being sold at Walmart for less than $5.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: I Know You Like to Think Your S#!* Don't Stink! - Outkast
customer_reviews.text: Don't be an Outcast in the staff bathroom. Use this stuff like poo-pourie and spray it in the bowl before you go, or spray it in the air if you care about your air. The tropical lemon scent smells like you are walking through an orchard of freshly squeezed and zested lemons. Glade and Fabreze scents smell like a ladfill in comparison to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Buy the organic version instead.
customer_reviews.text: Buy the organic version instead. It smells like real orange. I bought this one by mistake and it smells like a chemical. It's awful.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Oily
customer_reviews.text: The first spray I bought was great. My grandmother loved the fresh lemon scent. But it leaves an oil residue if it hits the floor. We started spraying it onto the paper garbage bag and I can't stand the smell. It definitely eliminates odors. There's nothing wrong with it. Maybe I just have an allergy but it's the most natural product we've found. Maybe try to spray less. I wish they made a Mint fragrance to try. I would recommend you buy it and see if you like the smell. It definitely smells like lemon. It's not chemical smelling at all. But something about it bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whoa
customer_reviews.text: I'm a long-term user of the Orange/Tropical Orange scent. It works PERFECT as a Poopourri cheaper alternative. This time however, I decided to see what Orange Vanilla was like. The tropical orange version isn't tropical in my opinion, but the Orange Vanilla Swirl....WOW. It's like those orange vanilla push pops. It's 100000% exactly like Orange Vanilla Swirl!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to say, all three spray cans have leaked ...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, all three spray cans have leaked when sprayed and also caused burning on skin when drilled in me.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J. Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, natural fragrance. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing what a natural, beautiful fragrance this is. It lasts a long time, and a little bit goes a long way. I don't feel like I'm being poisoned when I smell it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Black

customer_reviews.title: I'M THROWING IT AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY didn't like the scent - CLOYINGLY SWEET - NOT CITRUS - will not effectively "freshen" a room - but it's really good at doing the opposite. And it's NOT RETURNABLE - a fact that was not clearly displayed on the sales page - rather, BURIED IN THEIR 2,460 WORD RETURNS POLICY. Even then, you'd have to know that it was flammable. So, unless you like cloyingly sweet scents, STAY AWAY. I'm now going for Citrus II to see how that goes - and THROWING THESE 3 CANS AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: SausalitoScott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I spray this in my trashcan every time I change the bag. Definitely helps keep any smelly odors from taking over. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell, but the sprayer stops working
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, but after a few uses, the sprayer stops working. Full can, can't get the scent out of the can.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Defective spray nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Odor elimination was just fair. However all 3 cans have defective spray nozzle and the window for returning is closed. Never thought all three would be defective and I would be able to switch the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Dreamsicles
customer_reviews.text: Decent attempt at that dreamsicle flavor. I'd recommend it. It is less medical smelling than the lemon. Lemon covers better but is slightly overbearing with a heavy hand. You can spray this orange vanilla as much as you need.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: I see why its 3 cans for 17. 00 ...
customer_reviews.text: I see why its 3 cans for 17.00 the product is the same, its just the cans are smaller. Spray them 3 times, the can is empty. Thanks but no thanks, its a rip off
customer_reviews.author: Leslie H.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've bought many different scents, but my current fave is Orange Vanilla Swirl. I spray it in my apartment building elevator in the morning (sometimes it is rank in there) and it still smells fresh in the evening. You're welcome neighbors!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He thinks his sh*t don't stink.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 3pack fresh orange to use in two porta potties at 4th of July party. I can't say anyone commented on how fresh the porta potties smelled or if it was even used. The third went in my husbands' bathroom. He LOVES it, and so do I. No bad smell out in the hall now. Instead of spraying in the air he does a short spray into the toilet bowl afterwards. It leaves an oily sheen on the water but seems to work well that way. I'll be ordering more for our other bathrooms. I think we'll even be taking this on trips from now on.
customer_reviews.author: hopalong

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I first became aware of Citrus Magic during a stay at our favorite B&B in San Francisco. The owner is very conscious of the environment and our impact on it. The last time I was there I wrote down the name of the product and the mfr. I then ordered it from Amazon. It is all natural and does just what it says: It eliminates odors rather than covering them up. It has a great smell too. I would use this if I had to pay double for it. Believe me, it is wonderfull.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not an overbearing scent. Fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Citrus sprays, this brand and this scent seems to work best. It’s just the right amount of light and fresh without the overbearing, cloying stench of other air fresheners. There are bigger bottles of different brands (natural citrus scents)at Home Depot for half the price however, you have to use numerous sprays and they don’t last nearly as long. The scent also doesn’t smell as good as this brand. So I’ll stick with spending a few more dollars for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: KLL

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute Best Room Freshener
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with the lemony scent of this spray!! It smells so fresh and clean with none of the chemical or artificial undertones you get from traditional room fresheners. Just a fresh lemon scent. A little goes a long way and the scent lasts! It really does work to cover offensive smells too. Actually, it does not cover the smell, it removes it all together. I have not experienced the issue with leaking canisters like others have. I ordered the three pack and all three work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: stacia76

customer_reviews.title: Leaks horribly when you spray
customer_reviews.text: The scent is on point and works well. However when you spray fluid comes pouring down the can onto your hands and onto the floor. It says right on the bottle that it is a skin irritant. So it's not cool when you get it all over your hand. It is non aerosol which is cool, but spewing fluid everywhere isn't good. You have a good product if it would just mist instead of pour all over the floor. Also, I received 3 bottles and all of them are the same they all leak everywhere when sprayed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Not as "orange" as I remember. Smells more like orange baby medicine. Fragrance does not linger very long at all and there's hardly any in each can. No thank you. VERY DISAPPOINTED! I won't be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: A long time favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a closed environment because of environmental allergies - mold and pollen are a real issue for me. I have an excellent air purifier and when mold levels are high I wish I could hide out at home forever! I also cook every day, and steam a lot of broccoli. This is the best air purifier I've ever used. I have one in each bathroom, and one in the kitchen. it keeps my house fresh and pleasant without that heavy perfume pall.
customer_reviews.author: Maren Hofstad

customer_reviews.title: Very strong orange smell but Ocean Breeze is better
customer_reviews.text: I think the orange smell in this is much too strong. In fact, I threw them all awaqy. A friend of mine gave me a can of the Citrus Magic Pet Ocean Breeze which has a much nicer fragrance; not overpowering. I don't have a big odor problem with the cat but when I notice something from the litter box area, I spray the Ocean Breeze one and it works. So that's my solution. I am giving the Orange three stars only because of the overpowering smell. Am giving the Ocean Breeze one 5 stars w/o having bought it here.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: REAL orange and lavender scent
customer_reviews.text: The only thing bad about using this is that you wont want to use anything else after. It smells great and it really eliminates the odor rather than mixing with it. Besides is such a natural scent, REAL orange and lavender. Quite strong so you just have to use a little and it lasts even though it might look like a small bottle.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: The very best air freshener ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a spray that gets rid of odors like this one. I have allergies, and the citrus scent doesn't bother me at all. It has become the only air freshener that I use. I've just found none better. What's wonderful is that it actually smells like real oranges rather than the artificial chemical smell that most air fresheners have. This one is on my subscribe and save now. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly carmichael

customer_reviews.title: So fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs that can release some of the nastiest odors that will overwhelm an entire room in short order. I have tried so many different products and this is the last one I need to try. A few short sprays and voila... odor is gone. It smells like real fresh citrus and I love the scent. So happy I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Quiet Life

customer_reviews.title: Not what I remember
customer_reviews.text: It's been a while since I've purchased this, so I'm not surprised it's changed. Smells more like a combination of grapefruit and cheap air freshener. Too bad, not the real deal anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Princess P

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Citrus Magic for several years and would never be without it. I buy the orange but have also used the lemon. The orange has the best scent - smells like real oranges. It eliminates odors very well. Just be careful to spray high up into the air as it does contain citrus oil. If it's sprayed too low to the floor, it might be slippery. Otherwise, I will buy this product as long as they make it!
customer_reviews.author: Shonmarie

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best product ever for what it's made to do. (or undo)
customer_reviews.text: When you use this product, have no fear that the next user of the room will have any idea of what you've been up to. It's a totally natural product and doesn't try to mask or cover up with some artificial smell like linen sheets in the breeze. This is the real deal. The citrus odor is a true citrus scent made from real oranges and not a fake one. It works like a charm. It's a natural smell and works very well. I'd love to take one to work if it wouldn't freak people out. :)
customer_reviews.author: Animal lover NY

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, but not a deodorizer.
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended for use on cat urine odor in carpet that lingered after cleaning with 10 different products. This does not work. The orange smell is nice, but the can holds very little product. A couple of sprays and it’s empty. I’d return it, but I threw out one of the empty cans.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best odor eliminator I have ever used. I have tried all kinds, including those sold by medical distributors and none of them truly eliminated odor. This product is a "miracle" in my opinion. There are no nasty chemicals. It is 100% essential oils. It may seem a little pricey but it's not. It really only takes the shortest little burst to get the job done. It is definitely citrus so if you can't tolerate a brief citrus smell, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret H

customer_reviews.title: Not the same.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product years ago and loved it. I used it when I was done changing a dirty diaper and the room needed a fresh, clean smell. I recently bought this, but it is not identical to my old one. This smell is slightly different, and I don’t like it. It does work well, but I may send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Diane Roche Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-Wrong scent
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. I ordered lavender scent, all the cans say lavender, but it clearly is NOT lavender. It’s citrus scent in the lavender bottle. I tried all 3 bottles to see if they were all the same & they were. They’ll be sitting in the shelf unused. Not a fan of citrus scents. :(
customer_reviews.author: Shelly R. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Best natural Citrus Air Freshener on the market!
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing one can of Citrus Magic three years ago, I won't purchase any other odor eliminator or air freshener as the true orange fragrance can't be beat! I love the scent of fresh oranges and spray it lightly in the bathroom or any room that needs refreshing. I also use it in my recycle & garbage bins & home waste baskets! The scent lingers where others completely disappear after a couple of squirts! This 3-pack was on sale and I will continue to use Citrus Magic forever - great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ms67GTO

customer_reviews.title: Smells divine and the scent really lasts
customer_reviews.text: Citrus magic is the only air freshener spray I will buy! This stuff smells divine and the scent really lasts! Awesome for covering up the peskiest of odors and a little goes a long way. These 3 cans will definitely last an entire year for me, so the deal is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: LittleBossLady

customer_reviews.title: Smells too artificial for me
customer_reviews.text: I love a good creamsicle and thought this would smell great but it is kind of a gross odor. The orange part is okay but the vanilla part is kind of a gross artificial smell. It does the job of covering up but I should have gone with straight orange or lime instead.
customer_reviews.author: DragoDellAqua

customer_reviews.title: Good if you love strong strong orange scents
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely terrific - they are VERY strong and with one squirt, the whole room is smelling like orange citrus. That being said, this isn't for everyone. The smell is super strong so use sparingly (not ideal for those with allergies.) Also, these are the smaller bottles (3 oz) so be warned of that. Otherwise? They're friggen fantastic and kill the nasty odors - especially good for the bathroom. I highly recommend them! 🍊
customer_reviews.author: Lucy STop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I swear by Citrus Magic spray
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Citrus Magic spray for a few years. The "berry" scent isn't my favorite scent but I think it was cheaper than the tropical scent I usually get. Despite that, these sprays really work well. I tend to think that other "leading" brands just layer perfume on top of the odor but Citrus Magic really seems to eliminate the odor. The scent does linger a long time, though, so a tiny bit of spray goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: k8simply

customer_reviews.title: Great orange smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I'm an Uber driver so keeping my car clean and smelling fresh is a constant battle. You don't realize how bad people tend to smell until you drive them for a living! I originally found this product at a local store while looking for Ozium. The added benefit of Citrus Magic is that you aren't left with a chemical smell, but instead it smells great and fruity! A quick spray after a less-than-fresh passenger and the next ones will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Very pricy for the small containers -But- very effective
customer_reviews.text: These come in really small spray containers and are a bit on the pricey side based on the size. That being said they do a much better job at eliminating bathroom odor than any other product we have tried. They don't just cover up the smell with a worse one like many other sprays - they actually eliminate the odor and leave a very pleasant citic aroma in its place.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: The natural approach
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this at work. And I like how it smells. It seems to work like wonders compared to other competitors like febreeze or blade which doesnt really eliminate the odor. You only need 1 or 2 sprays of this and the smell lingers for a long time. It definitely removes the odor. And the good thing is it's all natural. I only wish it comes in a bigger can. Other than that, I will keep buying these
customer_reviews.author: Jan3t

customer_reviews.title: It does not spray
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this because it this does not spray. It is a stream. Where do you spray. All are the same. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Valerie V. Mastrov

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful and works better than anything else especially in the bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Citrus magic for years. It is definitely the best product I have ever found especially for use in the bathroom! The smell of it is wonderful just like fresh oranges. It seems to me that it absorbs and eliminates odors rather than just covering them with perfume like so many other products.
customer_reviews.author: Jan H.

customer_reviews.title: Stale, Gross Smell!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely covers up smells and lasts a long time - but it smells bad! It smells stale and like fruit peels that were left in the trash can. I really hate this smell and I am not picky about smells. It lingers and lingers. I almost could not sleep in the room where I sprayed it 8 hours earlier. Thankfully I'm a mom to 3 and my exhustion won, but it's awful. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: It's just like the citrus air-freshener Trader Joe's used to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Great air-freshener! I previously used a different brand of citrus air freshener sold at Trader Joe's because it was all natural, inexpensive, and worked very well. The manufacturer would not fix/redesign the poorly designed spray nozzle at Trader Joe's request, so the product has been dropped. Then I found and ordered Citrus Magic on Amazon and it works just like the product that TJ's used to sell. Maybe it's the same manufacturer???? In any case, Citrus Magic works very well; the scent is very pleasant, eliminates odors effectively with minimal amount of spray. Highly recommended. I'll be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Alag

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for my home
customer_reviews.text: Citrus Magic is the only air freshener that I will use in my home. It's ONLY ingredient is "citrus oils". In the stores they only have the orange one so that's what I always use, but I was SO happy to find this lemon scent on here. Smells really natural, and fresh, I cannot live without Citrus Magic.
customer_reviews.author: Roshamas

customer_reviews.title: Works great but no tropical scent
customer_reviews.text: This spray is great at covering bathroom smells. But don’t let the name fool you—there is absolutely no tropical scent to this whatsoever. I give it 4/5 for that reason. It’s lemon/lime/orange. Plain and simple
customer_reviews.author: Hamster Girl

customer_reviews.title: The scents are realistic not sweet and strong
customer_reviews.text: My wife has allergies for so many strong and artificial scents...but, Citrus Magic is all natural and really eliminates odors nicely. After cooking fish which left the kitchen and dinning room with a strong odor. We sprayed it and the odor was gone in 5-10 minutes. It is a wonderful product and we have been using it for 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C. Craven

customer_reviews.title: It smells really good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The container leaks, leaving a greasy mess in the bathroom and on my hand. I’ve only used it twice, and I had to clean up or slip on the oil that landed on the floor. (I have a small bathroom). They should recommend that it’s sprayed in the toilet instead of spraying it in the air! In fact, I just sprayed it in the toilet and it smells really good!!!! I’d rather clean the oil in the toilet than falling.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeCam

customer_reviews.title: Natural Smelling Odor Eliminating Spray
customer_reviews.text: I put these in the public workplace restrooms because everyone seems to spray too much of whatever is on hand when they do their business. Several people here have asthma or chemical sensitivities and these definitely have a more natural smell that is easier on the lungs and nose. A little goes a long way. They eliminate odors as well as, or better than, most chemical smelling deodorizing sprays. I have repurchased these regularly. No one has complained about the scent and I quite like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D

customer_reviews.title: This scent never gets old.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the smell of orange zest (and fruit essence). This deodorant fills the bill for exactly what I have been looking for. I like the simple (and safe) essential oils ingredient. One small spray does the job, it is pretty potent stuff so don't overdo it. I also like it because it doesn't have an 'overbearing' scent that some of the other deodorant sprays have (too much and I start to gag).
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: This is the best odor eliminator I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great - do not waste your money on any other products out there - not even other products by this company. If you want to deal with odors of any kind in your house or your vehicle - buy this stuff. It does not take much - and the orange scent is not over-powering at all. Buy this product - you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: truman

customer_reviews.title: Leave it here
customer_reviews.text: Too strong-this is worse than the odor you’re trying to get rid of; it actually burns my nose and throat with just one small spray and lasts for about 15 minutes or more in the air. You just can’t get rid of the burning fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: KTDidd

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to eliminate of the nastiest odors and pet safe
customer_reviews.text: I have to be very careful in my home because I have birds with very sensitive respiratory systems, so I can't use regular air fresheners because they can be toxic and are potentially fatal. This is a fantastic pet safe air freshener with a wonderful orange fragrance I adore. Strong enough to eliminate of the nastiest odors safely.
customer_reviews.author: 🤗Ovrjoyd🤗

customer_reviews.title: Miracle spray
customer_reviews.text: These do an amazing job. My back car seats had water leak from a cooler and molded. A neighbor recommended this spray and save me hundreds. Instead of replacing the seats they don't smell anymore. I almost cried because I was so relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It truly only takes 1 squirt to make a room smell exactly like someone is peeling an orange! I discovered it about I'd say 20 years ago and a little mom-and-pop drug store. I'll never forget the first time I smelled it, it was one of those Kodak moments I can remember so distinctly the first time I smelled it I was just amazed and I was hooked from then on.
customer_reviews.author: Stormylu57

customer_reviews.title: week!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sent but ot is so week. I liked the Pure Citrus better. It gets ride of more smells and coast less. I was disappointed. I would say this is great for someone who just wants a light smell.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: Scent does NOT last long at all!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but the scent does NOT remain for more than 5 min. I was a fan of the grapefruit scent, which sadly is no longer made. Tried this! Was disappointed. Not sure if I'll give the lemon scent a try? The smell is good for the nano-second that it lasts, but that's it; even when sprayed onto fabric. Poof! It's gone! No trace!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Quickly eliminates odors
customer_reviews.text: This eliminates foul odors very quickly in the bathroom (immediately). You only need to use a tiny amount. The pleasant scent lingers for quite awhile. It has a nice combination of orange and vanilla. I’ll never waste my money on another spray again. This works a million times better than anything else I’ve ever tried. And it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: GSDCJST

customer_reviews.title: "New Look" = New Smell (now chemical)
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years because it did not smell like chemicals. Just tried my latest subscribe & save order (3-pk). Cans say "New Look". Chemical smell is also new. (I sure wish manufacturers would quit messing with good products.)
customer_reviews.author: TXD2

customer_reviews.title: Love these odor eliminating sprays
customer_reviews.text: Love these odor eliminating sprays. I believe they are healthier and it takes very little product to get good results. I keep food scraps separate in a small container, spray it and NEVER have an odor in the kitchen. Wonderful for use if you have someone sick you are caring for.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Orange concentrate spray. It smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have 1 spray in each bathroom. It works well and I love the aroma! I sometimes spray it in the kitchen after cooking a garlic added dish.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Brand

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Citrus Magic spray. It has a genuine citrus fragrance and is long lasting. I only spray a small amount and it lasts for a long time. I have an old trunk with a terrible smell inside and I sprayed it with the Citrus Magic and it now smells like oranges. The fragrance has not weakened yet and it has been days. I ordered more. I say when you find a great item stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: MarMar

customer_reviews.title: Love how it's all natural
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this product is all natural and not bad for health. It eliminates bad odor quickly. I somehow don't like the smell though... it's not bad, but maybe it's too strong? That said, I believe I will keep using this product because chemicals used in Febreze seem to be really bad for health. I didn't have insecticide at home, so used Febreze onto bugs like flies, moths, and ants. They all died immediately... pretty scary. Citrus Magic doesn't contain chemicals that kill bugs, but it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: marielle

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, one small quick spray can freshen up any room and eliminate any odor. Unlike all the other air fresheners that you have to spray the entire area and the spray falls all over everything this only takes one short spray upward and it's gone. I keep a can in each bathroom, been buying this since 2007, a nurse in the hospital carried a can in her pocket. I can't say enough about it except I panic when the can is running low! Just remember not to spray like a regular air freshener, you'll also be surprised at how long it last!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Liz 911

customer_reviews.title: Lavender? Nope.
customer_reviews.text: This definitely works but the scent is citrus. It’s labeled lavender escape but it smells like oranges and just oranges. I was hoping for an equal lavender scent but it’s just not there. That’s the only reason for 3 star rating. Its misleading. Only a small amount is needed to mask odors. Just don’t expect any smell but citrus!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Burns

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cruise!
customer_reviews.text: I read air freshener is a good thing to bring on a cruise! We all go #2 and this helps cover the odor in a tight space! I always use citrus magic as it is not a perfume smell, just a light natural fragrance and covers odor naturally. Perfect size for TSA
customer_reviews.author: Jane Markoski

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: These cans are a smaller size and although I totally love the scent, the cans do not last a long time at all. It seems like one can only lasted a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Great product - will buy more
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice odor elimination spray. The orange smell is fresh, and the product does what it is intended to do. I like the smaller can, because it doesn't take up a lot of space under my bathroom sink. The small can is also easier to hang on to than larger cans are, for folks like me who have small hands. Finally, the button is a good design, and product does not drip out during or after the spraying process.
customer_reviews.author: Campmommie

customer_reviews.title: More than a Scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent on these are great and takes away the smell pretty fast. Can also use for cleaning too. Finger marks on frig, oven, ink & magic marker marks. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Fred YZ

customer_reviews.title: Gives the house a great citrus scent!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bright orange citrus smell. Not happy with the price increases as this product makes a great gift. We have dogs and after a good run and romp spraying this citrus magic near the AC intake gives the house a nice smell. Works great when cooking strong foods too! I give the 3 set of air freshener as gifts and everyone loves it. Good product but use it sparingly. It's really strong!
customer_reviews.author: MYB

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates odors and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my long time fav. It works to eliminate and not just cover up. I love to spray when I get to gym locker room so that when my workout is over I get ready for work I’m a nice fresh smell versus a locker room that smells like sweat! It is an oil so be sure to spray in air and not on items.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Daresta

customer_reviews.title: Orange Essential Oils Eliminate Odors in an Instant
customer_reviews.text: The compact size of this essential oil spray is a convenient size for travel or for use in your home. Don't be fooled by the small size, since this can of spray lasts a long time. I like that it is eco-friendly and it's not an aerosol with harmful ingredients. I also appreciate that it's a three-pack at such an affordable price. I've ordered this product three times in the past two years.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: BEST AIR FRESHENER EVER FOUND!
customer_reviews.text: The best Air Freshener I have ever found. Been using this product for several years and to my dismay the local store closed. Imagine my pleasure when I found it on Amazon. The fragrance is not over powering not does is it leave a strong after smell. I have used the CITRUS also. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jane navarre

customer_reviews.title: Citrus vs floral fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This odor eliminator works well in the bathroom. I must avoid all fragrances except those from from and this works great, leaving a refreshing lemon smell. So far the spray has not clogged the spray for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Natural Product. True Citrus Smell.
customer_reviews.text: No heavy odor just fresh citrus. Our favorite is the lemon which makes any musty area smell so fresh. We slso use Citrus Magic where we store our trash cans, even after we scrub them, especially during the summer . One or two pumps and odors are not covered but disappear.Not an aerosol which is an appreciated benefit for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: I Shop 2

customer_reviews.title: Jacked up prices???
customer_reviews.text: Great product but WHY more than double the price now?? It used to be around $11 for a pack of 3 and now it’s $27??? Seems like a Rip off. Loved it a lot but not gonna pay that much.
customer_reviews.author: SeñorVirgo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with natural ingredients instead of carcinogenic chemicals and it really works well!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Removes odors instantly with no lingering perfumey smell. Best of all, it is a natural product and not a chemical, as most air fresheners are, and does not have the carcinogenic risk that chemical air fresheners have. It smells fresh and as I mentioned, really works well!
customer_reviews.author: F.N.

customer_reviews.title: Love that orange smell...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. When I saw it on Amazon, I ordered it here.. The container is larger then I find in the stores. It lasts a long time cause you don't have to use as much as regular products of this type.. Dollar for Dollar this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinegirl

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works WAY BETTER than Poo-Pouuri! Has a very pleasant, natural citrus scent and doesn't clog your toilet with oils like Poo-Pourri. Just disappointed with the recent price hike but it's supply and demand pricing on Amazon since Covid-19. This stuff really does the trick! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. Purchase anything else, but this. The scent is awful, it doesn’t clear up the air from bad odors.
customer_reviews.author: MizzSS

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: One star it seems it was sent empty the 3 sprayed finished everyday one spray how come ??? It very expensive to finish the 3 sprays in 3 days eventhough another brand bigger size have the same smell and last a month for $4.50 won’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: New image

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take a lot of spraying to be effective.
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well. I like the smell. It is kinda expensive, but a can goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Colley

customer_reviews.title: orange is the best, most effective one
customer_reviews.text: The orange scent of the Citrus Magic is the only one I will buy now. I've tried several of the other scents and they are all more expensive and don't work as well. The orange scent is very pleasant and fresh, covers up any odor instantly, and doesn't give you that fragrance headache because it's just orange oil.
customer_reviews.author: noky64

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I buy these all the time because it's natural oils and it smells real! These go with me every time we go on vacations because I do not like the conventional air refreshers that smells like chemicals. Gets the smell of rotten food and the stink out of bathrooms quickly without giving you a migraine.
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: Clean, fresh non-chemical scent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent iin bathroom for odor elimination. Fresh scent... doesn't feel like the cloying floral scents often in such products. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Glo G.

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried EVERYTHING to remove urine odor, on my carpet, due to my dog having had "accidents". THIS PRODUCT is the ONLY thing that actually worked!!! I'm very very happy with my purchase. And...will order again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: R.Stanley

product_meta.title: Citrus Magic Natural Odor Eliminating Air Freshener Fresh Orange, Pack of 3, 3-Ounces Each
product_meta.description: Scent:OrangeCitrus Magic's Spray Air Freshener has harnessed the natural power of citrus in order to help you eliminate odors and freshen the air around you. Remove unwanted odors from any room in the house and fill the air with a clean, refreshing scent. Citrus Magic Spray Air Fresheners are 100% natural and contain pure citrus oils making the spray last up to 4 times longer than most conventional sprays. Forget using water, gas, and a little perfume to mask odors. Eliminate odors on contact and instantly notice the difference. Citrus Magic strives to maintain the highest level of natural possible while still creating effective cleaning products for the home.
feature_bullets: Destroy foul odors on contact with a natural citrus spray
Created from 100% active ingredients made from pure and natural citrus oils
Lasts up to 4X longer than conventional aerosol sprays

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,452 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
